Summary: Meteor like object headed for house, then became a diamond like object that cruised/hovered over the house at low altitude and made no noise.
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Granbury
There were no other sightings in Granbury on or around July 12th 2010
divs: sighting detailsi was sitting with my friend in his hot tub when all of the sudden a meteor like object appeared to be heading for us from far out extremly fast. once it got to us it was flying very low with no noise and was a diamond shape. it had 4 white\natural lights on the corners that didn't blink. it was cruising while over the house, then stopped for about 1 second then continued to cruise and we lost sight of it in the trees. we concluded that it had to be a ufo based on the fact that it cruised over the house at an altitude well under a mile and made no noise at all. the entire event happened in about 15 to 20 seconds.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
